about.title: About me
about.description1: I am Erick, a passionate 23-year-old full stack programmer based in Peru. I have 4 years of experience in frontend and 6 months exploring backend. In frontend, I specialize in creating intuitive interfaces with technologies like React, Next.js and Astro. In backend, I work with Node.js, Serverless and databases.
about.description2: My greatest motivation is to face new challenges and keep learning. I seek to collaborate with dynamic and talented teams, providing creative and effective solutions.
resume.title: Resume
resume.education.udemy: Digital courses and specialization in software development, both front-end and back-end.
resume.experience.freelance: Freelance Team Project - University study group to create personal projects
resume.experience.2myr: Full Stack Developer - Node js, Serverless, Prisma, Typescript as backend and React, Next, Gatsby, Typescript, Mui as frontend and strapi, sonic as cms
resume.experience.fromsolvers: Senior Frontend Developer - React, Typescript, Rxjs, Styled-Components, and other React libraries
resume.experience.indra: Senior Frontend Developer - React, Typescript, Rxjs, Styled-Components, and other React libraries
